description: Scientists at Georgia Tech have created an AI technique that pre-trains exoskeleton controllers using existing human motion datasets, removing the need for lengthy lab-based retraining. The system predicts joint behavior and assistance needs, enabling controllers that work as well as hand-tuned versions. This advance accelerates prototype development and could improve robotic exosuits, prosthetics, and mobility aids for amputees, stroke survivors, and workers who need strength and fatigue reduction.
title: AI Model Learns to Predict Human Gait for Smarter, Pre-Trained Exoskeleton Control

description: Researchers from the Allen Institute and Japan’s University of Electro-Communications have built one of the most detailed mouse cortex simulations ever created. Using Japan’s Fugaku supercomputer, the team modeled around 10 million neurons and 26 billion synapses, recreating realistic structure and activity. The virtual cortex offers a new platform for studying brain disorders, testing therapies, and comparing digital models with emerging AI-based neural simulations and full-brain connectome efforts.
title: Scientists Build One of the Most Detailed Digital Simulations of the Mouse Cortex Using Japan’s Fugaku Supercomputer

description: The Mighty Nein is a fantasy adventure series based on Critical Role’s second campaign. Discover its plot, cast, where to watch, trailer insights and overall reception in this complete series guide.
title: The Mighty Nein Series Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: Maadan Kodai Vizha is a Tamil rural drama set around vibrant village festival traditions. Explore its plot, cast, OTT availability, and strong viewer reception, along with its 8.5 IMDb rating. The movie is about the village's festivities and traditions in the changing world.
title: Maadan Kodai Vizha Now Streaming on OTT: Everything You Need to Know About this Tamil Rural Drama

description: Kasivu (2025) brings a heartfelt Tamil drama to YouTube, featuring MS Bhaskar and a compelling cast. With realistic emotions and grounded storytelling, the film has started gaining attention online. Although OTTplus has shut down and the film lacks an IMDb rating, viewers can easily watch Kasivu on YouTube through the RYTUVIDU channel.
title: Kasivu Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know About This Tamil Drama Movie

description: The Oppo Reno 15C key features and specifications have been tipped online. The latest leak reveals that the handset might feature a 6.59-inch 1.5K display with a 120Hz screen refresh rate. The handset might also triple-camera setup on the rear panel. Here’s everything you need to know about the latest Oppo Reno 15C smartphone.
title: Oppo Reno 15C Key Specifications Tipped Online Ahead of Launch

description: Scandal Eve brings an intense mystery rooted in the entertainment industry, following a race against time to stop a career-ending scandal. Streaming exclusively on Netflix India from November 13, 2025, the series promises suspense, emotional depth, and sharp twists. With strong performances by Ko Shibasaki and Haruna Kawaguchi, the J-drama is already gaining attention for its gripping storyline and thrilling pace.
title: Scandal Eve Season 1 Now Streaming on Netflix India: Everything You Need to Know About The Japanese Mystery Drama

description: The Moto G57 Power is confirmed to feature a 7,000mAh battery and a Full HD+ display with 120Hz screen refresh rate. The handset will be powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 processor along with triple-camera setup on the rear panel. The handset will come with Android 16 operating system.
title: Moto G57 Power: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features, and More

description: Samsung Galaxy A77 and Samsung Galaxy A57 have been spotted on Geekbench, revealing some key features. The Samsung Galaxy A77 bears model number SM-A776B, while the Galaxy A57 comes with model number SM-A576B. Both models run Android 16 operating systems.
title: Samsung Galaxy A77, Galaxy A57 Spotted on Geekbench with Exynos SoCs, Android 16

description: WhatsApp has introduced a group member tags feature in its latest beta update, allowing users to assign personalized labels that identify their roles within group chats. The feature, currently available to select beta testers, enables members to add custom tags up to 30 characters long that describe their responsibilities, expertise, or positions within specific groups.
title: WhatsApp Reportedly Testing New Group Member Tags Feature on Android

description: OnePlus Ace 6T design renders have been leaked online. The renders show that the handset will come with a compact design language. The handset is reported to be powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor along with 16GB of RAM.
title: OnePlus Ace 6T Design Renders Leaked Online Ahead of Official Launch

description: Huawei Enjoy 70x Premium Edition has announced in China. The latest smartphone comes loaded with a 6.78-inch OLED display with 120Hz screen refresh rate. The handset is powered by the Kirin 8000 processor and runs on HarmonyOS. The device features a dual-camera setup on the rear panel with a combination of 50-megapixel primary sensor and a 2-megapixel secondary shooter.
title: Huawei Enjoy 70X Premium Edition Announced with Kirin 8000 SoC, Curved AMOLED Display: Price, Specifications
